scripts.network: hc s clean && pnpm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "pnpm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "pnpm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && cd ui && pnpm run start"
scripts.test: pnpm run build:happ && pnpm run build:client && cd tests && npm t
scripts.start:happ: concurrently "RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped generate ./workdir/sensemaker_happ.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a sensemaker_happ network mdns" "pnpm run playground"
scripts.package: pnpm run build:happ && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: pnpm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: pnpm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dnas/sensemaker/workdir && hc dna pack ./dnas/test_provider/workdir
scripts.clean:modules: rimraf node_modules; for DIR in $(find -type d -iname node_modules); do echo "  Remove $DIR"; rm -Rf "$DIR"; done
